en: SHE’S PROBABLY JUST SHY:Suzie won’t let you enter her room or talk to you. Maybe someone knows how to get on her good side?
TIP OF MY TONGUE:There’s something stuck inside the wolf’s throat. It looks uncomfortable. Maybe someone has some medicine?
A FIRKIN OF WITCH’S HONEYBREW:For a big ol’ gal with a painfully sore throat.
A SECRET HANDSHAKE:Mithra told you to knock 5 times on Gertrude’s door to get her to open it. And if she still won’t, just keep knocking until she does.
TIME OF DEATH: Unknown. "Oh, we found her sometime this morning!". Yeah, real useful.
TIME OF DEATH: any
TIME OF DEATH:Before morning. She was already dead before breakfast.
TIME OF DEATH:After nightfall. Other witches have seen her around before she went to bed.
TIME OF DEATH:At the strike of dawn. Alive during the night, dead before the sun was fully up.
MULTIMAGICAL MINGLING:Suzie and Vicky were more than just good friends. Roomates, maybe.
SHIITAKE SIESTA:Vicky was having trouble sleeping well. Suzie asked Gertrude for a fungal fix to this issue.
FUNGUS CAKE:A mushroomy confection found in Vicky’s room. It looks so sweet, you get queasy just looking at it too long.
TRAGICALLY TORN PHOTO:A once-happy photo featuring Vicky with Suzie. It’s been ominously torn down the middle.
SUSPICIOUSLY NON-SUSPICIOUS ALARM CLOCK:It’s almost… too normal. What manner of secrets does it hold?
INSULTINGLY INTACT MUSHROOM:The missing mushroom. Colorful, grotesque, and frustratingly un-eaten.
VICKY’S ROOM KEY:Each witch only has the key to their respective rooms.
DETERMINED TO DEPART:Vicky wanted to leave. To be anywhere else, and live life under any other sky.
A MURDER MOST MUNDANE:No magic was used in the murdering of this witch.
A BIG, BAD WOLF:...why exactly was the key to Vicky’s room found stuck in the wolf’s throat? Temmie says it’s a coincidence, that he just found it laying around. An almost insulting explanation.
CHAMPIGNON CONFUSION:What if Vicky’s death was manslaughter? A tragic stroke of bad luck and absent-mindedness on Gertrude’s part could explain her untimely demise.
SIMPLY, A SPURNED LOVER:A time-honored tradition. Vicky’s murder was a crime of passion, the poor girl killed in a fit of overpowering jealousy.
A SEVERE AND PUNCTUAL LAPSE IN JUDGMENT:What a tragic twist! An accident?! Sleepy Vicky simply stumbled out of her room at the wrong time of night, when it sits dangerously far above the hallway.
APPROPRIATELY SUSPICIOUS ALARM CLOCK:Why was it displaying a time an hour earlier than it should?
